h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Cuo Jin-Yin Belt Hook Location
content: The Cuo Jin-Yin Belt Hook is located in the Village of Lanxi in The Webbed Hollow. Upon defeating The Second Sister and waking up underground, it can be found in a chest.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Cuo_Jin-Yin_Belt_Hook.md', within the main section titled 'Cuo Jin-Yin Belt Hook', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Cuo Jin-Yin Belt Hook Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Cuo Jin-Yin Belt Hook is located in the Village of Lanxi in The Webbed Hollow. Upon defeating The Second Sister and waking up underground, it can be found in a chest.
